Title: Tales of Symphonia The Animation: Kratos-sensei no Private Lesson
Description: ['A special bonus animation included in the first volume of the Tales of Symphonia DVD.', '\n', '\r\nLloyd and Collete talk about the special DVD editions, and Professor Kratos gives a summary of the ancient history of the world in Tales of Symphonia.']
